channel.title: The NEW Podcast Pickle Show
channel.description: The NEW Podcast Pickle Show is reborn from the Podcast Pickle Show. I talk about my website PodcastPickle.com, My blog PDillys.com and any other items I feel like talking about. Your host is Gary Leland aka P.Dilly.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The NEW Podcast Pickle Show is reborn from the Podcast Pickle Show. I talk about my website PodcastPickle.com, My blog PDillys.com and any other items I feel like talking about. Your host is Gary Leland aka P.Dilly.
channel.itunes:summary: The NEW Podcast Pickle Show is reborn from the Podcast Pickle Show. I talk about my website PodcastPickle.com, My blog PDillys.com and any other items I feel like talking about. Your host is Gary Leland aka P.Dilly.
channel.itunes:author: P. Dilly

item.title: The NEW Podcast Pickle Show - Episode 2
item.description: Episode 2 Not only are we back from the dead. We are now producing a Vidcast. Our vidcasts are produced live on Tuesdays at 2PM Central time. Please join us for future shows at www.Pickle.TV This week I talk about The Reviews For Riches Contest, The new book from the host of Podictionary. I also ramble on about things. Feel free to subscribe.
item.itunes:author: P. Dilly

item.title: The NEW Podcast Pickle Show - Episode 1
item.description: Episode 1 The news is that The Podcast Pickle Show is back from the dead. It is no longer podfaded. It has been reborn as The NEW Podcast Pickle Show. It is a short show this week. I am, just trying to get the ball rolling again. I talk about The Reviews For Riches Contest, my blog PDillys.com, and just a few notes on what the new show will try and accomplish. I know it is short, but it's a start. Feel free to subscribe.
item.itunes:author: P. Dilly
